title: Hi, I need Help, I been banned.

replies.body: Email support@avicus.net or contact a manager on Skype, this is not the place to appeal.
replies.body_tagged: Email support@avicus.net or contact a manager on Skype, this is not the place to appeal.

replies.body:
If you do not get an answer from support@avicus.net within 7 days, resend an appeal.

Try to keep this off of the forums please.
replies.body_tagged:
If you do not get an answer from support@avicus.net within 7 days, resend an appeal.

Try to keep this off of the forums please.

replies.body: Resend the E-Mail if you  haven't gotten a response within 1 week. My best advice is for you to not create Forums Post(s) about your ban, it will decrease your chances of getting unbanned. Best Wishes!
replies.body_tagged: Resend the E-Mail if you  haven't gotten a response within 1 week. My best advice is for you to not create Forums Post(s) about your ban, it will decrease your chances of getting unbanned. Best Wishes!

replies.body: Yeah, I know, but I was waiting 7 days for it -.- And I contact managers on skype but anyone accept my friend invitation.. Thanks
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, I know, but I was waiting 7 days for it -.- And I contact managers on skype but anyone accept my friend invitation.. Thanks

replies.body: I'm pretty sure if you appeal on the forums you get your chances of being unbanned about 0/100.  It states in the rules that if you ban evade all accounts will be banned forever, with a minimal chance of being unbanned.
replies.body_tagged: I'm pretty sure if you appeal on the forums you get your chances of being unbanned about 0/100.  It states in the rules that if you ban evade all accounts will be banned forever, with a minimal chance of being unbanned.

replies.body: Thanks @Princezz_Dubstep.. I will make it again.. :l
replies.body_tagged: Thanks @Princezz_Dubstep.. I will make it again.. :l

replies.body: Be patient, they have a lot to go through! Just resend it :)
replies.body_tagged: Be patient, they have a lot to go through! Just resend it :)
